channel.title: How to change starting inventory?
channel.description: Hey guys i figured out how to change the starting equipment, the armor and stuff, but every time someone new comes, i have to give them the cash, and the other stuff. But i want it so right when u make a new guy u automatically get the stuff in your inventory(inventory, the one with 28 spaces, not the armor one) so i don't need to do that. Does anyone know? or is there a tutorial? [br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:27:02 AM[/size][hr]any1 know?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:49:58 AM[/size][hr] :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: ;D
